name: Mystic Archaeology Sim
description:
Works With Oculus rift DK2 but hasn't been tested in a while.

comfort level: medium - intense (no way to center your view to your movement)

Use an XBox controller.

Pick up / put down torches with A.

If you see a rip in the earth, do NOT explore it, jump it and move on.

"Villagers" will try and kill you.

Alt + F4 to exit.

step sounds provided with Unity, all other sounds provided by: Khadeja Merenkov

http://www.khadejasvoices.com/wordpress/
